name: Mystery Series: A Vampire Tale

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Nordic Games/Mystery Series - A Vampire Tale/Avt_Build_MK3.95.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Humble archive
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Nordic Games/Mystery Series - A Vampire Tale/Avt_Build_MK3.95.exe

installer:
